properties.name: arconia.opentelemetry.enabled
properties.description: Whether OpenTelemetry support should be enabled.

properties.name: arconia.opentelemetry.logs.enabled
properties.description: Whether support for OpenTelemetry logs is enabled.

properties.name: arconia.opentelemetry.metrics.enabled
properties.description: Whether support for OpenTelemetry metrics is enabled.

properties.name: arconia.opentelemetry.traces.enabled
properties.description: Whether support for OpenTelemetry traces is enabled.
